name: CityTote
description:
made of carefully chosen soft vintage leather CityTote is designed to retain the imprints of use. Frequent use will improve this bag, making each truly customized to its owner. CityTote features leather handles and block-striped cotton lining with interior pocket. The bag closes with a magnetic closure.

The lining comes in three hand dyed colourversions of eco-friendly dye and can be individually chosen / black, blue or red

Please contact NMGD regarding colour options for the leather body.

size: W 37cm x H 30cm
19 cm Handle Drop
50 cm Shoulder Drop
lined

options.name: individual choice of leather and lining

name: Double #02
description:
Dress up your city look with this beautiful necklace from NMGD

Yellow Jade and vintage Bakelite Beads

neckdrop/50cm

handmade to order, NMGD Belgium


Here Yellow Jade beads of varying sizes are strung with authentic vintage Bakelite beads! 
The rich golden sunflower color of the Bakelite is very pleasing to the senses

name: Double #01
description:
Showcase luxe sparkle and a hint of bohemian flair 
and pair with dressed-up or casual style

Tiger Eye, Wood & vintage Bakelite Beads and Ring

neckdrop/50cm

handmade to order, NMGD Belgium


Authentic rare vintage Bakelite ring and beads show wonderful uniqueness because of a slight color variation due to the ageing process

A sensually sublime elegance that's not to be missed!

Onyx,  faceted Rounds-Jet & Yellow Jade 
beaded on cream silk

neckdrop/54cm

handmade to order, Belgium

Antique Vintage Japanese Faceted Rounds-Jet 
These are very old and were machine made in Japan at the earliest development of faceted beads. They do have a seam as the technique had not yet been perfected. A wonderfully rare find.

this precious bag is an indispensable accessory for your evening out
each bag looks slightly different

name: Tee 'Honest'
description:
This T-shirt is made of 100% fairtrade organic cotton and handprinted with eco-friendly colors, which do not contain ozone-depleting or toxic chemicals or any volatile solvents.

Slight irregularities -due to the manual printing and crafting process- are intended and guarantee the individual character and the unique design of the garment. 

100% certified organic cotton / 
unbleached 140g/m2

short sleeve / round neck / regular fit 
base on picture: sky blue
frontprint: fiery red

men-size - S M L

made to order in Antwerp, Belgium
